At the same time, a huge conspiracy is quietly underway ... Easy-to-use but strategy-based turn-based combat. Each profession has its own unique skills and skills, each profession has a powerful nirvana. Monsters dodging by walking, relatively free choice to fight. Freely explore the underground palace and open the treasure chest, which contains the most valuable legendary equipment. Nearly 50 high-quality BGMs, immersed in the world of the kingdom fantasy. As the protagonist travels to various places: warm villages, monster-covered forests, bustling towns, and dangerous caves. Annoying random battles. Limited save points. Depressed protagonists. Points of no return.
